item.description:
Join me for "Minute to Win it" at Milly's tavern. I've been told it's allot of fun so lets get a group together and play. They give out cash and prizes and have a dj playing for the evening.

The action starts at 8 pm but I'll get there earlier to try to get a table or two. If you want dinner, they have half price apps from 4-7 and $1.00 beer. Anyone who hasn't been there, they are Manchester's only micro brewery and make many great brews. The food is good too.

http://www.millystavern.com/index.htm

So all you brave souls come on out and lets have a laugh or two.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to grab a table
item.name: "Minute to win it" at Milly's tavern
